name: Super Leaf Fan Adventure
description:
Explore three levels by moving around using leaf fans, which are strong enough to propel yourself and to blow away any enemies and hazards you find. Can you collect all the coins in every level?

Sound Effects:

  • https://opengameart.org/content/sfx-the-ultimate-2017-8-bit-mini-pack
  • https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-sound-fx

Music from https://opengameart.org/content/chippey

Art Kit used for Miz Jam 1: https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack
